email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Would you be able to come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can adjust the freight rate to $50.75 per metric ton. The vessel is in excellent condition, and I can provide the full specs upon request. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the adjusted rate and demurrage terms are acceptable. Please send over the vessel's full specifications and the contract draft for review. Also, confirm the laycan dates once more. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. I’ve attached the vessel’s full specifications and the draft contract for your review. The laycan remains 15-20 October. Let me know if you need any further adjustments or clarifications. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on our end. We’ll proceed with the contract as discussed. Please confirm the final freight rate of $50.75 per metric ton and the laycan dates. We’ll arrange for the necessary documentation on our side. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed. The final freight rate is $50.75 per metric ton, and the laycan is 15-20 October. I’ll send over the final contract shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working with you. Best, Sarah
